title: ListOfRegionInfo
description: Config file for additional region information

RegionInfo.description: Represents extra information about a region in SMZ3.

Region.description: Unique key to connect the Region with other configs

TypeName.description: Gets the class typename for the region

Name.description: Gets the possible names for the region.

Hints.description: Gets the possible hints for the region, if any are defined.

WhenDiedInRoom.description: Text for Tracker to say when dying in a room or screen in the region

OutOfLogic.description: Gets the phrases to reply with when the location is out of logic

Possibility.description: Represents one possibility of a SchrodingersString.

Weight.description: Gets the weight associated with the item.
